entities.description: The health condition ever told by a medical professional.
Information regarding whether the respondent was ever told they had cancer.
Information regarding whether the respondent was ever told they had high blood pressure.
Information regarding whether the respondent was ever told they had bladder cancer.
Information regarding whether the respondent was ever told they had blood/leukemia/lymphoma cancer.
Information regarding whether the respondent was ever told they had any other type of cancer.

relationships.description: Indicates that a respondent has been diagnosed with a specific health condition.
Specifies whether the diagnosed health condition is cancer.
Specifies whether the diagnosed health condition is high blood pressure.
Specifies whether the diagnosed cancer is bladder cancer.
Specifies whether the diagnosed cancer is blood/leukemia/lymphoma cancer.
Specifies whether the diagnosed cancer is any other type of cancer.
